answers.answer: My friend disagreed with her estimated due date but she said in the end it didn't matter because the dr works off the date they give you in your early scans. If your measuring a bit bigger, you're probably having a big healthy baby unless the dr has talked to you about gestational diabetes. As for kicking, if you're concerned you're not feeling as many kicks it could be because she is running out of room, if you feel a significant difference there's no harm in calling your dr and talking to them about your concerns. Congratulations and good luck!

question: Hey guys I'm a ftm and I am supposedly 34 weeks and a day but we calculated and its not right I'm really 36weeks and my last apt I was measuring 39weeks and that's when I was 32. I been losing my mucus plug and lost my appeiti  been forcing mg self to eat little. I go for ultrasounds every 2 weeks I have one next Monday. Do you think they will check me up there. Baby has been moving very little. I mean very!!! Kinda scares me because she loves to act like she's kicking her horse lol. Just alil advice please and thank you ;)
title: FTM
